Fortune.title: 2019 OVERVIEW
Fortune.content: This is an amazing year for Leo, and one where you can do and have anything you want, if your desire to have it is strong enough.

Fortune.title: LOVE
Fortune.content: A soul connection with someone remarkable can take you by surprise. However, be ready to give and take and realize that life usually comes with the necessity of making some compromises to get what you want.

Fortune.title: CAREER
Fortune.content: Your key to success at work this year is to stay focused and to increase your level of productivity. The more organized and in control you are the more able you can act quickly when opportunities cross your path.

Fortune.title: MONEY
Fortune.content: Donâ€™t limit your thinking. Be prepared to go after opportunities that promise to abundantly reward you financially. Be both idealistic and realistic. Go for gold!

Fortune.title: SPIRIT
Fortune.content: Intellectual enlightenment can change your attitude and understanding about yourself and the world around you.
